[Unicode 标准](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37123)将码位 （数字） 分配给每个受支持的脚本中的每个字符。The [Unicode Standard](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37123) assigns a code point (a number) to each character in every supported script. Unicode 转换格式 (UTF) 是一种方法来将码位编码。A Unicode Transformation Format (UTF) is a way to encode that code point. [Unicode 标准](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37123)使用以下 Utf:The [Unicode Standard](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37123) uses the following UTFs: - Utf-8，它将每个码位表示为一到四个字节的序列。UTF-8, which represents each code point as a sequence of one to four bytes. - Utf-16，它将每个码位表示为一到两个 16 位整数的序列。UTF-16, which represents each code point as a sequence of one to two 16-bit integers. - UTF-32，它将每个码位表示为一个 32 位整数。UTF-32, which represents each code point as a 32-bit integer. 有关 Utf 和其他编码支持的详细信息，请参阅[.NET Framework 中的字符编码](~/docs/standard/base-types/character-encoding.md)。For more information about the UTFs and other encodings supported by , see [Character Encoding in the .NET Framework](~/docs/standard/base-types/character-encoding.md). 类表示的 utf-16 编码。The class represents a (least significant byte first). 例如，拉丁文大写字母 （码位 u+0041） 序列化为 （十六进制） 如下所示：For example, the Latin Capital Letter A (code point U+0041) is serialized as follows (in hexadecimal): - Big endian 字节顺序： 00 00 characters using the native byte order of a particular platform. 例如，最好在小 endian 平台，如 Intel 的计算机上使用 little-endian 字节顺序。For example, it is better to use the little endian byte order on little endian
